results.title: [Queen who returned Compilation]
results.creator_credit: H. Rodney Power, David Swift and State Film Centre of Victoria
results.brief_description: Features three films of Royal visits between 1954 and 1963. 1.”Royal Visit to Melbourne” - Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh. 2.”Queen who Returned” - Queen Elizabeth, the Queen Mother, visits Victoria. 3.”Royal Visit” - Queen Elizabeth and the Duke on tour in Victoria.
results.creator_credit_for_label: H. Rodney Power, David Swift and State Film Centre of Victoria
results.description: Features three films of Royal visits between 1954 and 1963. 1.”Royal Visit to Melbourne” - Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh. 2.”Queen who Returned” - Queen Elizabeth, the Queen Mother, visits Victoria. 3.”Royal Visit” - Queen Elizabeth and the Duke on tour in Victoria.
description_for_label: Features three films of Royal visits between 1954 and 1963. 1.”Royal Visit to Melbourne” - Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth and His Royal Highness the Duke of Edinburgh. 2.”Queen who Returned” - Queen Elizabeth, the Queen Mother, visits Victoria. 3.”Royal Visit” - Queen Elizabeth and the Duke on tour in Victoria.
